title: Effects of acid rain on forests

content.question: Which of the following would be the most likely effect of acid deposition on a northern forest?

choices.label: Decreased ability of trees to withstand cold weather
Decreased concentration of H+ ions in the soil
Decreased levels of light on the forest floor
Increased buffering capacity of the soil
Increased rates of photosynthesis in evergreen needles

content.answer: Decreased ability of trees to withstand cold weather
